card.name: Throne of Blugu
card.text: You may cast spells that are exactly three colors without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Moonstone
card.text: You may have Moonstone enter the battlefield as a copy of any land on the battlefield or any land card in a graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

card.name: The Holy Word
card.text: The first noncreature spell you cast each turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is The Holy Word's toughness. As long as your devotion to red, white, and blue is less than eight, The Holy Word is a 1/1 Illusion creature with hexproof. (Each {R}, {W}, or {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to red, white, and blue.)

card.name: The Soul of Winterisle
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You may cast a spell from your hand with mana value X or less without paying its mana cost, where X is twice The Soul of Winterisle's power. Activate only as a sorcery. As long as your devotion to blue, red, and green is less than eight, The Soul of Winterisle is a 1/1 Illusion creature with hexproof. (Each {U}, {R}, or {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue, red, and green.)

card.name: Elandra, Lady Eternal
card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 0/0. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to Elandra, Lady Eternal's power. As long as your devotion to white, black, and red is less than eight, Elandra is a 1/1 Illusion creature with hexproof. (Each {W}, {B}, or {R} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white, black, and red.)

card.name: Gurgle, Jolly Jelly
card.text: Whenever Gurgle, Jolly Jelly enters the battlefield or attacks, creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Gurgle's power. As long as your devotion to black, green, and white is less than eight, Gurgle is a 1/1 Illusion creature with hexproof. (Each {B}, {G}, or {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black, green, and white.)

card.name: Kohrm, Bigger Than You
card.text: Vigilance, trample, lifelink As long as your devotion to green, blue, and black is less than eight, Kohrm, Bigger Than You is a 1/1 Illusion creature with hexproof. (Each {G}, {U}, or {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green, blue, and black.)

card.name: Cruel Tusker
card.text: Cruel Tusker enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {T}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

card.name: Rotroot Hatchling
card.text: Rotroot Hatchling enters the battlefield with a flying counter, a vigilance counter, a trample counter, and a +1/+1 counter on it. If Rotroot Hatchling would be destroyed while it has a counter on it, instead remove from it all damage and one of those counters chosen at random.

card.name: Lionize
card.text: Counter target spell. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature you control.

card.name: Truth in Fire
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, surveil 1, then exile the top card of your library. When you do, choose one — • You may play that card this turn. • Truth in Fire deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Night's Sway
card.text: If a creature attacking causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, you may put two +1/+1 counters on that creature.

card.name: Slavering Mimic
card.text: As Slavering Mimic enters the battlefield, choose a color. Slavering Mimic is the chosen color. Other creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1.

card.name: Moonmist Shadow
card.text: If you would lose unspent white mana, lose all but one of that mana instead. The same is true for blue, black, red, green, and colorless.

card.name: Shard of the Moon
card.text: During turns other than their own, players can't add mana.

card.name: The Children of Lesser Gods
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Each other creature you control with base power and toughness 1/1 gets +1/+1.

card.name: Lambent Moonlight
card.text: Vigilance As Lambent Moonlight enters the battlefield, choose a color. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, put a +1/+1 counter on Lambent Moonlight.

card.name: Littlest Witch
card.text: When Littlest Witch enters the battlefield, beckon the moon. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Patchwork Assistant
card.text: Haste {1}{W}, Sacrifice Patchwork Assistant: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Guardian of Elandra
card.text: {3}, {T}: Add three mana in any combination of {W}, {B}, or {R}. {3}{W}{B}{R}: Put three +1/+1 counters on Guardian of Elandra. It deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

card.name: Inquiring Squire
card.text: When Inquiring Squire enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Ritual Reciter
card.text: Vigilance {2}{R}: Ritual Reciter gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Defiant Warlord
card.text: Vigilance Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Shadow of Hospitality
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Castle Familiar
card.text: Flying Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Night's Vizier
card.text: Flying {2}, Discard Night's Vizier: Search your library for a basic Swamp or Mountain card or a card named Nomad Outpost, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Skybound Spook
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Flying

card.name: Liminal Chant
card.text: Destroy target creature if it's tapped or has power 4 or greater. Beckon the moon. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: To the Manor Dead
card.text: When To the Manor Dead enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until To the Manor Dead leaves the battlefield, then beckon the moon. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Into the Fray
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Vindictive Urge
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Immortal Grace
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink and ward {2}. Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Silverbark Ancient
card.text: Menace, lifelink Whenever a creature you control dies or whenever you pay life to cast a spell or activate an ability, beckon the moon. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Hare-Raising Goliath
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Hare-Raising Goliath attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control. Then if its power is 15 or greater, destroy all creatures you don't control.

card.name: Angelic Snapper
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it wasn't cast, put a +1/+1 counter on Angelic Snapper. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Cemetery Warden
card.text: Vigilance When this Cemetery Warden enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Bride of the Moon
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, beckon the moon. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Moon's Blessing
card.text: Up to one target creature you control gains undying until end of turn. Then destroy all creatures. (When that creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Elandra's Demand
card.text: Choose one. If {B}{R} was spent to cast this spell, you may choose two instead. • Destroy all artifacts. • Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less. • Destroy all enchantments.

card.name: Polarized Lightning
card.text: Whenever a permanent enters the battlefield under you control, if it wasn't cast, Polarized Lightning deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Elandra's Executioner
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Elandra's Executioner gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Lunar Maiden
card.text: When Lunar Maiden enters the battlefield, beckon the moon twice. (To beckon the moon, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Bearer of Bad News
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it wasn't cast, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Harried Harrier
card.text: Flying When Harried Harrier enters the battlefield or dies, exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Bride of Elandra
card.text: Flying When Bride of Elandra enters the battlefield, create a 2/1 red and white Elemental creature token with "This creature can't block." Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Moat Trawler
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you've cast a black spell or a red spell this turn, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Haughty Elitist
card.text: Double strike Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Impatient Host
card.text: Flying, haste {W}, Exile Impatient Host from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {B} or {R}." until Impatient Host is cast from exile. You may cast Impatient Host for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Kiss of the Moon
card.text: Beckon the moon, then each creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn. (To beckon the moon, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: An Unwise Bargain
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains lifelink and undying until end of turn. (When that creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Home to Roost
card.text: Return any number of target nonland permanent cards with total mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Home to Roost.

card.name: Invoke Faith
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a white creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Stinky Tinkerer
card.text: Menace {3}{U}, Sacrifice Stinky Tinkerer: Choose a card type. Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Guardian of Winterisle
card.text: {3}, {T}: Add three mana in any combination of {U}, {R}, or {G}. {3}{U}{R}{G}: Put three +1/+1 counters on Guardian of Winterisle. Draw two cards, then discard a card. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

card.name: Exultant Cultist
card.text: When Exultant Cultist dies, draw a card.

card.name: Breaching Skysnapper
card.text: Flying {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Breaching Skysnapper.

card.name: Callow Willow
card.text: Casualty 2 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell. The copy enters as a token.)

card.name: Artificer's Guile
card.text: When Artificer's Guile enters the battlefield or dies, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Winterisle Worldheart
card.text: Winterisle Worldheart can't be blocked by artifact creatures or enchantment creatures. {2}, Discard Winterisle Worldheart: Search your library for a basic Mountain or Forest card or a card named Frontier Bivouac, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Patient Practitioner
card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

card.name: No, You First
card.text: Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.) Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. You may have it phase out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Forbidden Foreboding
card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {X}.

card.name: Midnight Quiet
card.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put up to one creature card and up to one noncreature card from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Thirst for Inspiration
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a red card.

card.name: Gaze Not Long Into the Orb
card.text: Enchant creature or artifact Enchanted permanent is a Treasure artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color," and it loses all other abilities.

card.name: Release the Hounds
card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) The owner of target nonland permanent puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library.

card.name: Ambling Cairn
card.text: Defender As long as a creature card was put into or left your graveyard this turn, Ambling Cairn can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Seagrass Muncher
card.text: Flash When Seagrass Muncher enters the battlefield, search target opponent's library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value X or less and exile it. That player shuffles. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Ready for Slime Time
card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) Choose target creature you control. Create X tokens that are copies of it, except they're X/X.

card.name: Covert Chameleon
card.text: Covert Chameleon can't be blocked. You may cast spells as though they had flash.

card.name: Filigree Experiment
card.text: Flash Flying When Filigree Experiment enters the battlefield, return target spell or nonland permanent to its controller's hand. Until your next turn, spells that player casts cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Accursed Orb
card.text: The first instant or sorcery spell you cast each turn has casualty X, where X is that spell's mana value. (As you cast that spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power X or greater. When you do, copy it.)

card.name: Form of the Shapeshifter
card.text: As Form of the Shapeshifter enters the battlefield, choose target opponent. Your life total becomes equal to that player's life total. Whenever the chosen player draws a card, you draw a card. Whenever the chosen player gains life, you gain that much life.

card.name: Weird Fruit
card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) Search your library for a noncreature artifact card or noncreature enchantment card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Winterisle's Demand
card.text: Choose one. If {R}{G} was spent to cast this spell, you may choose two instead. • Target player draws three cards, then discards two cards. • Create a tapped token that's a copy of target creature you control. • Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Hybor, Kohrm's Hand
card.text: When Hybor, Kohrm's Hand enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Hybor's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the greatest mana value among permanents on the battlefield.

card.name: Projection of Power
card.text: When Projection of Power dies, return target noncreature, nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Squawkslopper
card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) Squawkslopper can't be blocked by creatures with power less than or equal to the number of card types among cards you own in exile.

card.name: Brother of the Briar
card.text: Flash Reach When Brother of the Briar enters the battlefield, choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell. • Brother of the Briar fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Cackling Lantern
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you've cast a red spell or a green spell this turn, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Happy Harvester
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample {U}, Exile Happy Harvester from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {R} or {G}." until Happy Harvester is cast from exile. You may cast Happy Harvester for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Cackling Croaker
card.text: Whenever Cackling Croaker deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Cackling Croaker enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if {R}{G} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Sea's Whisper
card.text: Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.) Surveil 2, then draw a card. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Ornery Slugabed
card.text: When Ornery Slugabed enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards

card.name: Invocation of Kohrm
card.text: Create a 0/0 green Barbarian creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each card type among cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.

card.name: Monumental Scorn
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Down to the Bone
card.text: Casualty 3 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 3 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.) Target player mills eight cards.

card.name: Gainsay
card.text: Counter target blue spell.

card.name: The Grand Spooking
card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) Draw three cards.

card.name: Gleeful Scavenger
card.text: Legacy 1—{1}{B} ({1}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains the following abilities until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.) Menace

card.name: Bitterly Departed
card.text: Menace {1}{W}: Bitterly Departed gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Prince of Fools
card.text: Legacy 1—{2}{B} ({2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains the following abilities until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.) Flying

card.name: Undergrubbler
card.text: Menace When Undergrubbler enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. If you discarded a creature card this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Undergrubbler.

card.name: Primal Practitioner
card.text: Menace Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put a creature you control, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Ambiguous Amphibuous
card.text: Casualty 2 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell. The copy enters as a token.) When Ambiguous Amphibuous enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Oozing Ghastlypod
card.text: Deathtouch {2}, Discard Oozing Ghastlypod: Search your library for a basic Forest or Plains card or a card named Sandsteppe Citadel, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Steal Strength
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Warrior's Reprieve
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control. When you do, beckon the moon." (To beckon the moon, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Eyes of Night
card.text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life. Beckon the moon. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Castigate
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card.

card.name: Consuming Ashes
card.text: Exile target creature. If it had mana value 3 or less, surveil 2. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Something in the Walls
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card you own in exile and in your graveyard. Exile target creature.

card.name: Soul of the Farmyard
card.text: Menace At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice two nonland permanents. Your opponents can't win the game and you can't lose the game.

card.name: Gurgle's Handmaid
card.text: Trample Legacy 13—{3}{B}{G} ({3}{B}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put thirteen +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It gains the following abilities until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.) This creature gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

card.name: Killer Kelp
card.text: Legacy 2—{3}{B} ({3}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It gains the following abilities until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.) This creature gets +X/+0, where X is the greatest power among creature cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.

card.name: Obsessive Prowler
card.text: Lifelink At the beginning of each player's end step, that player loses 4 life unless they attacked this turn.

card.name: Misshapen Marauder
card.text: Legacy 1—{3}{B} ({3}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains the following abilities until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.) Whenever this creature attacks, up to X target creatures you don't control each get -1/-1 until end of turn, where X is this creature's power.

card.name: Nightgrin Cultist
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Beckon the moon. Activate only as a sorcery. (To beckon the moon, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.) {1}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Beckon the moon. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Griller Killer
card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you gain 3 life and draw a card.

card.name: Gurgle's Demand
card.text: Choose one. If {G}{W} was spent to cast this spell, you may choose two instead. • Each opponent sacrifices a creature. • Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life. • Return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Jeave Maitre D'Undead
card.text: Vigilance Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, create an X/X white Zombie creature token, where X is the number of counters it had on it.

card.name: Ambitious Mastermind
card.text: Deathtouch Sacrifice Ambitious Mastermind: Beckon the moon. Activate only as a sorcery. (To beckon the moon, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Crawling Chaos
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink When Crawling Chaos enters the battlefield, if you cast it, destroy target nonland permanent with mana 3 or less you don't control.

card.name: Merciless Mollusc
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you've cast a green spell or a white spell this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Merciless Mollusc and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Castle Sneak
card.text: Legacy 2—{2}{B} ({2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. It gains the following abilities until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.) Whenever this creature attacks, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Mystic Mushroom
card.text: When Mystic Mushroom enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you gain 1 life. {B}, Exile Mystic Mushroom from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {G} or {W}." until Mystic Mushroom is cast from exile. You may cast Mystic Mushroom for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Jolly Rotman
card.text: Menace Jolly Rotman enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if {G}{W} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Midnight Rictus
card.text: Destroy target creature. Beckon the moon. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Oversold Cemetery
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Make Demands
card.text: Search your library for two cards, put one of them into your hand, one of them into your graveyard, then shuffle.

card.name: Hallowed Bones
card.text: When Hallowed Bones enters the battlefield, mill three cards. {3}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Hallowed Bones: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Great Disappointment
card.text: Destroy target black creature or black planeswalker. Its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Eager Contraptioneer
card.text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Eager Contraptioneer: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Experimental Turbohorn
card.text: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.) When Experimental Turbohorn dies, it deals 1 damage to target opponent.

card.name: It's Alive
card.text: Create two 1/1 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens with menace.

card.name: Spiteful Squash
card.text: Trample {2}{U}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Brawling Banquet
card.text: When Brawling Banquet enters the battlefield, create a 2/1 red and white Elemental creature token with "This creature can't block." Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Jack of No Trades
card.text: Menace {2}, Discard Jack of No Trades: Search your library for a basic Plains or Island card or a card named Mystic Monastery, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Stubborn Slitherblade
card.text: Stubborn Slitherblade can't block. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Swarm of Fuzzy Bees
card.text: Casualty 2 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.) Swarm of Fuzzy Bees deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Shock Treatment
card.text: Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.) Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: An Unquiet Rest
card.text: Exile the top card of your library and up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Reduce to Junk
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target artifact or enchantment spell. • Put target artifact or enchantment into its owner's library second from the top.

card.name: Oopsie
card.text: Oopsie deals 4 damage to target creature. The damage can't be prevented. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: This is Fine
card.text: This is Fine deals 6 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle. Create a 2/1 red and white Elemental creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Night Has a Thousand Eyes
card.text: Whenever an instant or sorcery you control deals damage to an opponent, create that many 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens with haste.

card.name: Plarb's Prototype
card.text: Plarb's Prototype enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. When Plarb's Prototype dies, if it had any +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with one fewer +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Studious Dracomancer
card.text: Flying Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever Studious Dracomancer attacks, each creature you control with lesser power gains undying until end of turn.

card.name: Fiery Manifestation
card.text: Casualty 4 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 4 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.) Fiery Manifestation deals 3 damage to each creature and planeswalker and to each battle you control.

card.name: Gore Snapper
card.text: Haste When Gore Snapper enters the battlefield, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw cards equal to Gore Snapper's power. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Holy Word's Demand
card.text: Choose one. If {W}{U} was spent to cast this spell, you may choose two instead. • Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. • Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase. • Holy Word's Demand deals 2 damage to each opponent and each creature they control.

card.name: Bone Moon
card.text: Nonbasic lands have "As this land enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped."

card.name: Gribbly Gourd
card.text: Menace Whenever a creature you control dies or whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, you may return target noncreature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Cragtusk
card.text: When Cragtusk enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target player, planeswalker, or battle. When Cragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 red Beast creature token.

card.name: Splat Frog
card.text: When Splat Frog dies, add {R}{R}{R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

card.name: Reckless Wrangler
card.text: Haste When Reckless Wrangler enters the battlefield, target creature with power less than or equal to Reckless Wrangler's power can't block until the end of your next turn. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Venomous Vellum
card.text: Spell you cast cost {2} less to cast as long as a creature you control died this turn.

card.name: Work in Progress
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you've cast a white spell or a blue spell this turn, Work in Progress deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Pyretic Paladin
card.text: Whenever Pyretic Paladin attacks, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Natterjack Necromancer
card.text: When Natterjack Necromancer enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target opponent. {R}, Exile Natterjack Necromancer from your hand: Target land gains "{T}: Add {W} or {U}." until Natterjack Necromancer is cast from exile. You may cast Natterjack Necromancer for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: A Scholar and a Gentleman
card.text: Prowess A Scholar and a Gentleman enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if {W}{U} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Wretched Strike
card.text: Wretched Strike deals 4 damage to any target. If excess damage was dealt to a permanent this way, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Lunar Betrayal
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. Until end of turn, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, it deals 2 damage to each opponent."

card.name: Haunting Memory
card.text: Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.) Return a noncreature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Soul Anchor

card.text: If a red instant or sorcery spell you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.

card.name: Consult the Idol
card.text: Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.) Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.text: When Croaked Croaker enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Entangle
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. When the creature you don't control dies this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Assault on the Senses

card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

card.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Font of Fertility: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Mulch
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Sickly Dewdragon
card.text: Reach, trample, haste Each other creature you control that's an Elemental, a Plant, or a Treefolk gets +1/+1. Whenever Sickly Dewdragon deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 green Plant Dog creature token named Mossdog with "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on it."

card.name: Wild Rumpus
card.text: Casualty 4 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 4 or greater. When you do, copy this spell.) Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Wild Rumpus.

card.text: {G}, Discard an enchantment card: Search your library for an enchantment card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Velocirooster
card.text: Ward—Tap two untapped creatures you control. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player taps two untapped creatures they control.) Trample, haste

card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a thorn counter on Mulch Ado About Nothing. When you do, target creature you control gets +X/+X and gains trample until end of turn, where X is the number of thorn counters on Mulch Ado About Nothing.

card.name: Innocuous Hatchling
card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) Vigilance, reach, trample Innocuous Hatchling enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.text: Choose one. If {U}{B} was spent to cast this spell, you may choose two instead. • Distribute two +1/+1 counters among creatures you control. • Draw a card for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. • Mill three cards, then return a card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.text: Exile target permanent.

card.name: A Bloody Harvest
card.text: Mumbo jumbo (For each card type, you may exile a card of that type from your graveyard while casting this spell. Each card you exile this way pays for {1}.) Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.text: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.text: Search your library for a creature card with mana value 3, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then repeat this process for creature cards with mana values 2 and 1. Then shuffle.

card.name: Plarb, the Occultest
card.text: Each card in your library is a red sorcery in addition to its other types and colors. Whenever you cast a spell, reveal the top card of your library. When you do, Plarb, the Occultest deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of colors the revealed card has. Put the revealed card on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Komastogoyf
card.text: Menace Komastogoyf gets +1/+1 for each card type among cards you own in exile.

card.name: The Lady Perseveres
card.text: Whenever a non-Prism creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it wasn't cast, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a 1/1 white Prism.

card.name: Swain, Lord Winterisle
card.text: Menace Whenever Swain, Lord Winterisle enters the battlefield or attacks, exile up to two cards from your graveyard. Target opponent chooses trick or treat. If they chose trick, draw a card. If they chose treat, put the exiled cards into your hand.

card.name: Duskbringer
card.text: Flying, deathtouch Whenever Duskbringer deals combat damage to a player, beckon the moon. (Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, or remove two counters from among your creatures to create a 3/3 Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Blrb, Bard of Gurgle
card.text: Blrb, Bard of Gurgle can't be blocked by creatures with power or toughness 2 or less. Blrb's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control plus the number of creature cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.

card.name: Magnum Oops
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value and exile it. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Ornery Booklender
card.text: Vigilance {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Brash Hero

card.name: Demanding Debutante

card.name: Shubbery Ambush

card.name: Gutless Scuttler

card.name: Draft Archetypes CLG
card.text: {W}{B} BECKON Call the moon for aid with +1/+1 counters or Spirit tokens. {B}{G} LEGACY Those who come before leave their skills behind. {G}{U} MUMBO Go big, go home, come back and go big again. {U}{R} CASUALTY Your creatures are expendable. Expend them. {R}{W} UNDYING Like, really expendable. {W}{B}{R} ELANDRA The Lady Eternal enjoys a focus on uncast creatures. {U}{R}{G} WINTERISLE The spooky island is home to an unquiet graveyard which cards will enter and leave. {B}{G}{W} GURGLE The jovial rotking is lord of +1/+1 counters. {R}{W}{U} LEAST KEY Scholars of the Holy Word have a tendency to die, and often. {G}{U}{B} KOHRM The warrior god cares for little but glory—Seek it with cards in your graveyard or in exile.

card.text: Mystic Monastery enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {U}.

card.name: Gleeb, A Man for All Seasons
card.text: Gleeb, A Man for All Seasons gets +1/+1 for each color you have three or more devotion to. Gleeb has first strike as long as your devotion to white is three or more. The same is true for flying and blue, lifelink and black, menace and red, and trample and green. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)

card.name: Deathless Siren
card.text: Flying Deathless Siren enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if {B}{R} was spent to cast it.

card.name: Exuberant Extoller
card.text: {3}{B}, Sacrifice Exuberant Extoller: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Shield of Time and Space
Ungracious Demonhost
card.text: Reach When Ungracious Demonhost dies, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Golem CLG
card.text: Menace

card.name: Guardian of the Rotmen
card.text: {3}, {T}: Add three mana in any combination of {B}, {G}, or {W}. {3}{B}{G}{W}: Put three +1/+1 counters on Guardian of the Rotmen. Return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

card.name: Guardian of the Least Key
card.text: {3}, {T}: Add three mana in any combination of {R}, {W}, or {U}. {3}{R}{W}{U}: Put three +1/+1 counters on Guardian of the Least Key. Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

card.name: Guardian of Kohrm's Ire
card.text: {3}, {T}: Add three mana in any combination of {G}, {U}, or {B}. {3}{G}{U}{B}: Put three +1/+1 counters on Guardian of Kohrm's Ire. It fights up to one target creature you don't control. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

card.name: Captive Wyrmsoul
card.text: Captive Wyrmsoul enters the battlefield tapped. As it does, choose three colors. {T}: Add one mana of one of the chosen colors. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Captive Wyrmsoul: Draw a card if mana of each of the chosen colors was spent to activate this ability.

card.name: Treasure CLG
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Elemental CLG
card.text: This creature can't block

card.name: Gravesoil Mimic
card.text: You may have Gravesoil Mimic enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature card in your graveyard, except it has menace in addition to its other abilities.

card.name: Pick Off
card.text: Target player discards two cards. If fewer than two cards were discarded this way, that player sacrifices a number of creatures equal to the difference.

card.name: Wight Watchman
card.text: When Wight Watchman enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures you control. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has vigilance.

card.name: Lord Blugu Swallows the Moon
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Lord Blugu Swallows the Moon enters the battlefield, draw five cards. Spells you cast cost {X} more to cast, where X is the number of defense counters on Lord Blugu Swallows the Moon.

card.name: Throne of Blugu (bundle promo)
card.text: You may cast spells that are exactly three colors without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Mossdog CLG
card.text: Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Goblin CLG
card.text: Haste
